xwikidoc.name: WorkspaceTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Workspace Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Various translations that are used in the wiki template and, implicitly, in the created wiki.
core.menu.type.wiki=Wiki core.menu.watchlist.add.wiki=Watch Wiki core.menu.watchlist.remove.wiki=Unwatch Wiki core.menu.admin.wiki=Administer wiki
# WORKSPACE INFORMATION PANEL workspacemanager.panel.title=Wiki information
# MESSAGES platform.workspace.wikiNotWorkspace=The current wiki is not a workspace. platform.workspace.gadgetWelcomeToWorkspace=Welcome to the **{0}** wiki. platform.workspace.currentUserIsOwner=You are the owner of this wiki. platform.workspace.currentUserIsAdministrator=You are an administrator of this wiki. platform.workspace.joinNeedToLogIn=To join this wiki you need to be logged in. platform.workspace.currentUserNotMember=You are not a member of this wiki. platform.workspace.currentUserCanJoin=If you like, you can [[join this wiki>>path:{0}]]. platform.workspace.currentUserIsMember=You are a member of this wiki. platform.workspace.currentUserCanLeave=If you like, you can [[leave this wiki>>path:{0}]]. platform.workspace.gadgetTopActiveUsersAllMembers=To see the full list of wiki members, you can use the [[User Directory>>Main.UserDirectory]] page. platform.workspace.invitationPendingForCurrentWorkspace=You have been invited to join this wiki platform.workspace.joinRequestPendingForCurrentWorkspace=You have requested to join this wiki platform.workspace.joinRequestAcceptedNotification=Your request to join the wiki ''{0}'' has been accepted. platform.workspace.joinRequestRejectedNotification=Your request to join the wiki ''{0}'' has been rejected. platform.workspace.candidateHandledSaveComment=Handled candidate {0} ({1}) platform.workspace.candidateHandledComment=Comment: platform.workspace.candidateAcceptedSuccess=Request accepted successfully. platform.workspace.candidateRejectedSuccess=Request rejected successfully. platform.workspace.inviteUserAlreadyMember={0} is already a member of the wiki. platform.workspace.inviteRequestAlreadyExists={0} already has a pending request. Please respond to that request instead. platform.workspace.inviteUserAlreadyInvited={0} already has a pending invitation. platform.workspace.inviteSaveComment=User ''{0}'' has been invited to join the wiki. platform.workspace.inviteNotification=You have been invited to join the wiki ''{0}''. platform.workspace.inviteSuccess={0} invited successfully. platform.workspace.invitationCancelSaveComment=Cancelled invitation {0} ({1}) platform.workspace.invitationCancelNotification=Your invitation has been cancelled and is no longer valid. platform.workspace.invitationCancelSuccess=Invitation cancelled successfully.
# Duplicated from WorkspaceManager.Translations. To be removed when the 2 are merged. workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist=Wiki [{0}] does not exist platform.workspace.exceptionWithMessage=Exception: {0}
# LABELS workspacemanager.prop.wikiprettyname.label=Pretty Name workspacemanager.prop.description.label=Description workspacemanager.prop.owner.label=Owner workspacemanager.prop.membershipType.label=Membership Type workspacemanager.prop.secure.label=Secure (SSL) workspacemanager.member.add=Add or invite users to wiki platform.workspace.gadgetWorkspaceInformationLabel=Wiki Information platform.workspace.gadgetTopActiveUsersLabel=Top Active Members platform.workspace.panelInformationNameLabel=Name platform.workspace.panelInformationDescriptionLabel=Description platform.workspace.panelInformationMembersLabel=Members platform.workspace.invitationActionViewLabel=View Invitation platform.workspace.joinRequestActionCancelLabel=Cancel Request platform.workspace.joinRequestActionRequestLabel=Request Join platform.workspace.joinActionJoinLabel=Join platform.workspace.leaveWorkspace=Leave Wiki platform.workspace.inviteUserNameLabel=User name platform.workspace.inviteMessageLabel=Message platform.workspace.inviteInviteButtonLabel=Invite platform.workspace.candidatesLabel=Candidates platform.workspace.candidateStatusLabel=Status: platform.workspace.candidateTypeLabel=Type: platform.workspace.candidateReviewerLabel=Admin: platform.workspace.candidateReviewerMessageLabel=Admin's Message: platform.workspace.candidateReviewerPrivateComment=Private Comment: platform.workspace.candidateAcceptLabel=Accept platform.workspace.candidateRejectLabel=Reject platform.workspace.invitationCancelLabel=Cancel Invitation platform.workspace.workspaceUsersTitle=Wiki Users platform.workspace.manageWorkspaceTitle=Wiki XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_status_pending=Pending XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_status_accepted=Accepted XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_status_rejected=Rejected XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_type_request=Request XWiki.WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass_type_invitation=Invitation
# HINTS workspacemanager.prop.wikiprettyname.hint=The display name of the wiki. workspacemanager.prop.description.hint=A brief description of the wiki and its purpose. workspacemanager.prop.owner.hint=A user who will have all the rights on the wiki. workspacemanager.prop.membershipType.hint=The way users can join this wiki. workspacemanager.prop.secure.hint=If enabled, all this wiki's generated externals URLs will starting with //https:~/~///. platform.workspace.inviteUserNameHint=The name of the user to add to the wiki. platform.workspace.inviteMessageHint=The message to send to the user. platform.workspace.candidatesHint=Users which have requested or which have been invited to join the wiki.
# DESCRIPTIONS admin.xwiki.manageworkspace.description=Manage settings such as wiki name, description, owner and membership type. admin.xwiki.workspaceusers.description=Manage wiki members: add, remove, invite, accept or reject wiki members.
